snippet: The British Broadcasting Corporation announced on Thursday that it would eliminate 2,000 jobs, cut its sports budget, show more reruns and broadcast fewer talk shows and game shows.
lead_paragraph: The British Broadcasting Corporation announced on Thursday that it would eliminate 2,000 jobs, cut its sports budget, show more reruns and broadcast fewer talk shows and game shows.

headline.main: ‘Radically Reshaped’ BBC to Include Fewer Jobs and More Reruns
headline.print_headline: ‘Radically Reshaped’ BBC to Include Fewer Jobs and More Reruns
headline.seo: BBC to Cut 2,000 Jobs and Show More Reruns
